text: The 2025 FIM Moto2 World Championship will be the premier class of the 77th F.I.M. Road Racing World Championship season. == Teams and riders == Team Constructor Chassis Riders No. Rider names Elf Marc VDS Racing Team Boscoscuro B-25 12 Filip Salac 96 Jake Dixon MT Helmets – MSI 3 Sergio Garcia 4 Ivan Ortolà Blu Cru Pramac Moto2 14 Tony Arbolino 28 Izan Guevara Speed Up Racing 13 Celestino Vietti 21 Alonso Lopez Klint Forward Factory Team Forward F2 9 Jorge Navarro 11 Alex Escrig CFMoto Aspar Racing Team Kalex Moto2 27 Daniel Holgado 80 David Alonso Fantic Racing 7 Barry Baltus 44 Aron Canet Idemitsu Honda Team Asia 64 Mario Aji 92 Yuki Kunii Italtrans Racing Team 10 Diogo Moreira 99 Adrian Huertas Liqui Moly Husqvarna Intact GP 18 Manuel González 81 Senna Agius OnlyFans American Racing 16 Joe Roberts 24 Marcos Ramírez QJmotor Gresini Moto2 15 Darryn Binder 75 Albert Arenas Red Bull KTM Ajo 53 Deniz Oncu 95 Colin Veijer RW-Idrofoglia Racing GP 71 Ayumu Sasaki 84 Zonta van den Goorbergh All teams use the required Pirelli tyres and Triumph 765cc 3-cylinder engines. == Calendar == These Grand Prixes are confirmed to have a date in the 2025 season: Date Grand Prix Circuit 1 2 March Thailand Grand Prix Chang International Circuit, Buriram TBD 11 May French motorcycle Grand Prix Circuit Bugatti, Le Mans TBD 25 May British Grand Prix Silverstone Circuit, Silverstone TBD 13 July German Motorcycle Grand Prix Sachsenring, Hohenstein-Ernstthal TBD 17 Aug Austrian motorcycle Grand Prix Red Bull Ring, Spielberg ==References== Category:2025 in sports Category:Grand Prix motorcycle racing Category:2020s in motorsport Category:World championships
title: 2025 Moto2 World Championship
